title: Jerusalem artichoke and apple salad
ingredients: ['200g Jerusalem artichokes', 'white vinegar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small handful pumpkin seeds', '2 tart apples', 'lemon juice', '1 large carrot', '1 to 2 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil', 'salt', 'pepper']
